channel.title: Drop rates and items
channel.description: I heard there was a program that shows you the drop rates and items that certain monsters drop for the server that you are playing, anyone know what this program is or where I would go about getting it? Thought someone told me I could find it on here but I cant seem to.

item.title: Drop rates and items
